EmailTemplate.subject: IDX Introduction - NWMLS - {!Service__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Contact__c}, Nice to e-meet you! My name is {!Service__c.OwnerFullName} and I am an IDX Coordinator at Luxury Presence. In order for us to display IDX data on your website, North West MLS requires us to have a data access agreement signed on MLS Grid. I kindly ask that you provide me with the following information to initiate the agreement for digital signatures. Agent's Name: {!Account.Contact__c} Agent's Email: {!Service__c.Agent_Contact_Email__c} Brokerage: {!Account.Brokerage__c}â€‹ Broker of Record's Name: Broker of Record's Email: Domain name: {Account.Company_domain_name__c} NWMLS also has a few additional requirements: 1) Agents must be registered with the US Copyright Office 2) DMCA Notice posted on the footer of the website 3) Brokerage Logo displayed on the header of the site Please follow the steps below to register with the US Copyright Office. Once registered I can create the DMCA notices for the footer. Additionally, the team will work on creating a joint logo for you and the brokerage (this is a requirement). 1. Click HERE to go to the US Copyright Office website 2. Click on "Register Here" and create an account. 3. Once you've created an account, you will receive a confirmation email. 4. You will need to verify your account by clicking on the link. Sign in to your account. 5. Click on "Add Service Provider". 6. You are the Service Provider and Designated Agent. 7. Process payment. 8. Receive an email confirmation. Confirm and search that you are listed on the DMCA Designated Agent Directory
Please let me know if you have any questions. Best Regards,
